name: Live at the Omnipodrome: Diamond Nightfall
name_original: Live at the Omnipodrome: Diamond Nightfall
description:
A Troika! micro-sphere created for The Great Troika! Pocket Sphere Jam.

The Omnipodrome is a godhead manifested in an arena. It is the energy of a crowd, deified. If you’ve ever been in a densely packed room, screaming, dancing, feeling your senses melt away, then you have been to the ‘Drome. It is a fountainhead for the musical energy that flows through the humpbacked sky, right off Troika’s last exit. Tonight, the legendary band Diamond Nightfall takes the stage. 

  • Meet the vibe-killing Hushers and their silencing magic!
  • Encounter strange energies in a unique concert hall! 
  • Listen to music, via concert, via pocketmod, via RPG!

Inspired by the psychedelic concerts of the 60's and 70's, along with all the rock shows I've ever been to. Watercolor, pencil, and printed images to give it a real Xerox-store vibe. 

Please consider donating! 
Not associated with the Melsonian Arts Council.
